CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1945, pg. 26 reads: "Happy Birthday-Carol Frances Mosby, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Kenny Mosby, of 3071 Centre Avenue, celebrated her eighth birthday by entertaining her friends at a party. Guests, left to right, are: Sharon Castor, Claudette Williams, Alice Scott, Shirley Williams, Richard Dorsey.  Second row: Carol Francis, Francis Smith, Sherman Gordon, Anna Smith, Blanche Scott, Kenneth Scott and Ronald Scott.  Not shown in picture are Samuel Jones Jr. and Vincent Tibbs Jr. Carol's father is stationed at Fort Bragg,  North Carolina. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, front row from left: Blanche Scott, Alice Scott, Shirley Williams, Carol Francis Mosby, Anna Smith, Claudette Williams, and Sharon Castor; back row: Richard Dorsey, Francis Smith, Kenneth Scott, Sherman Gordon, and Ronald Scott standing around table with floral tablecloth and birthday cake, in home of Mr. and Mrs. Kenny Mosby, of 3071 Centre Avenue, another version
